glsa.title: libxml2: Remotely exploitable buffer overflow
glsa.synopsis: libxml2 contains multiple buffer overflows which could lead to the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: libxml2 is an XML parsing library written in C.

description.p: Multiple buffer overflows have been detected in the nanoftp and nanohttp modules. These modules are responsible for parsing URLs with ftp information, and resolving names via DNS.

impact.p: An attacker could exploit an application that uses libxml2 by forcing it to parse a specially-crafted XML file, potentially causing remote execution of arbitrary code.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
